--mbx-link-color-hover-light.description: Link text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off`, on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)

--mbx-link-color-hover-dark.description: Link text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on`, on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)
